NAME: Name
SMART_BEACH_WILL_SEND_YOU_AN_SMS_MESSAGE: Smart Beach will send you an SMS Message to verify your phone number
WE_HAVE_SENT_YOU_AN_SMS_WITH_A_CODE_TO_T: We have sent you a sms with a code for the number above
TO_COMPLETE_YOUR_PHONE_VERIFICATION_PLEA: To complete your phone number verification, please enter the 4-digits activation code
SUNBEDS_TO_BE_AT_THE_FREE_UMBRELLA: Sunbeds to be at the free umbrella?
NO_BEACH_FOUND_ON_YOUR_SEARCH: No beach found on your search
TAP_ON_SUNBED_YOU_WANT_TO_ORDER: Tap on the sunbed you want to order
PLEASE_USE_THE_STAR_TO_RATE_IT: Please use the star to rate it
PLEASE_TELL_US_WHAT_YOU_THINK: Please tell us what you think
COUNTRY_SUPPORT_THE_PHONE_NUMBERS_WHICH_: support the phone numbers which start with
WORKING_HOURS_OUT_OF_BOUNDS: Nu puteti trimite aceasta comanda deoarece sunteti in afara programului plajei
PRESS_ONE_OF_THE_BUTTONS_TO_GET_DIRECTIO: Press one of the buttons to get direction to the beach
SELECT_THE_DAYS_WHICH_YOU_LIKE_TO_RELEAS: Select the days which you will like to release from your reservation
YOUR_REQUEST_PENDING_MESSAGE: Your request is in pending. Wait for beach approval
DUPPLICATED_RESERVATION_DETECT: You cannot access this beach because you already booked with a date found in your search criteria. For view/change, tap on RESERVATION at the bottom
INFO_BEFORE_RESERVATION: In order to see the reservation section, please do a reservation first
INFO_BEFORE_MENU: The menu will be imported after you have a reservation made
INFO_RESERVATION_CARD_DETAIL: Tap on reservation card for more options
CANOTSEAT: On this beach is not allow to stay 2 persons in both sides. Pls reconsider your choose and take place in one of the sides
INFO1_1_CONTENT: The time you have to honor this reservation is {{number}} minutes
INFO1_2_CONTENT: If this period has passed and the beach has not confirmed that you have arrived, you have a maximum of {{number}} reservations remaining
INFO1_3_CONTENT: Failure to repeat in a repeated manner will result in blocking this phone number for an indefinite period of time.
INFO2_1_CONTENT: After booking confirmation by beach reception, you can order any item BEACH MENU section(if the beach has a bar) and the waiter will receive your orders.
INFO3_1_CONTENT: Once the reservation has been confirmed by the beach reception, you can leave this reservation at any time of the day. This action will eventually attract loyalty points, points you can use for future bookings.
INFO4_1_CONTENT: You can change the position of the umbrella / baldaquin chosen at any time of the day. Please contact the beach representant for this
INFO5_1_CONTENT: If u release the reservation before {{value1}} the beach rewards you with {{value2}} % of that day value as loyalty points. If u release a full day, the beach rewards you with {{value3}} % of that day value as loyalty points. These points you can use them later on for paying another reservation.
YOU_HAVE_NOT_LOYALITY: {{beachName}} don't agree to pay the reservation with credit card, also you have not Loiality points on this beach.
BOOKING_CANCELED: We have no more seats for the searched period. Sorry for this inconvenience.
BOOKING_POSITION: Your reservation was changed from "old position" to "new position". If you are not agree, pls cancel the reservation. Thank you.
UNREAD_RECEPTIONER: Please wait, your reservation is in pending approval. If you dont want to wait, you can "cancel" it.
NAME_LENGTH: The name must have 2 characters at least.
PAWD_LENGTH: The password must have 6 characters at least.
GDPR_REQUIRED: Terms and conditions + GDPR are required.
PHOTO_REQUIRED: If you do not upload photos, you will not be able to create reservations for some of the beaches. Would you like to sign up without a photo?
CUSTOMER_NO_PHOTO: You can not create reservation to this beach without photo, Do you want to add profile photo?
SHARE_LIMIT: You can add up to {{seats}} friend.
SHARE_LIMIT_P: You can add up to {{seats}} friends.
PHONE_VALIDATION: Please enter a valid phone number
GUEST_PERMISSION: You have already a reservation as a guest
BOOKING_PERMISSION: You need an account to do a booking
TOOLTIP_FRIENDS: You can add your friends to your reservation up to number of seats you have reserved.Once they accept your invitation, they will be able to order food and drink if the beach permits.
TOOLTIP_GIVERESERVATION: You can give your reservation to anyone, even if they dont have an account in Smart Beach. Once they create a new account, they will find your invitation and they can accept or cancel. If they accept the Invitation, you will be notified and the reservation will be removed from your account.
